item.title: Brain scientists are seeking weight-loss drugs without the nausea
item.description: Weight-loss drugs like Wegovy and Zepbound often cause nausea and other side effects. Brain scientists are looking for ways to solve this problem.

item.title: CDC claims — without evidence — there's a possible link between vaccines and autism
item.description: The CDC has changed its stance on vaccines and autism, claiming now there's a possible link. The claim, which has been widely debunked, alarmed doctor...

item.title: Former CDC official reacts to agency shifting stance on vaccines and autism
item.description: NPR's A Martinez speaks to Demetre Daskalakis, a former high-ranking official at the CDC, about the agency renewing false claims about vaccines and au...

item.title: Recalled baby formula linked to a botulism outbreak may still be in some stores
item.description: A botulism outbreak that has sickened more than two dozen babies in 15 states has been linked to ByHeart formula sold nationwide. Here's what to know ...

item.title: The CDC revives debunked 'link' between childhood vaccines and autism
